item.title: Okayu Nyumu! R announced
item.content:encoded:
More information to come on October 23.

Entergram has officially announced Okayu Nyumu! R, the follow-up to its romance visual novel Okayu Nyumu! starring and overseen by Hololive Virtual YouTuber Nekomata Okayu.

Details about the game, including platforms and a release date, were not announced, but a teaser website went live today promising more information to be come on October 23.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/okayu-nyumu-r-announced

item.title: Tokyo Xtreme Racer coming to PS5
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

Currently available for PC.

Genki will release street racing game Tokyo Xtreme Racer for PlayStation 5, marking the series’ first new entry on PlayStation platforms since Tokyo Xtreme Racer 3 for PlayStation 2 in 2003, the developer announced. A release date was not announced.

Tokyo Xtreme Racer first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on January 23, and fully launched today.

Here is an overview of the game, via Genki:

About

Tokyo Xtreme Racer is a racing game set in a sealed-off future Tokyo, where you compete for the fastest speed in your customized cars on the highways that weave through the city, aiming to reach the top.

Drive real cars on meticulously recreated courses, compete against powerful rivals, slip through other cars, and engage in spirit-wracking battles.

This is a series with unparalleled appeal.

Key Features

  • SP Battle (Spirit Point Battle) – Unlike regular racing games, the SP Battle is a unique battle feature based Spirit Points, a numeric value that quantifies the willpower of drivers. Not only is your speed tested, master the mind games and break your opponent’s resolve.
  • Blaze Through the Midnight Shuto Expressway – With the Tokyo Expressway faithfully reproduced, the complex twists and dramatic elevation changes deliver an adrenaline-pumping racing experience that’s as close to the real thing as it gets.
  • Countless Rivals with Mysterious Charm – The race begins with a headlight flash as you face off against rivals with distinctive cars and bold driving styles.

Watch a new trailer below.

Full Release Cars #17: Honda “LFA (LFA10)”



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/tokyo-xtreme-racer-coming-to-ps5

item.title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater online battle mode ‘Fox Hunt’ launches October 30
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Over 10 minutes of gameplay footage.

Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater‘s online battle mode “Fox Hunt” will launch on October 29 at 9:00 p.m. PT / October 30 at 12:00 a.m. ET, Konami announced.

Here are the global release times:

And here is an overview of the mode, via the game’s official website:

A Thrilling Hide-and-Seek-Based, Completely Original Online Multiplayer

An online experience unique to Metal Gear that utilizes the central elements of the base game—camouflage and survival.

Based on the Sneaking Rule From Metal Gear Online

Utilizes the fundalmentals of one of the popular game rules from Metal Gear Online and the sneaking gameplay elements iconic to the Metal Gear series, and the latest graphical enhancements that amplifies the tension of hide-and-seek to a whole new level.

Realistic Camouflage Enhanced by Cutting-edge Graphics That Fools the Naked Eye

  • AT-Camo:
    • An All-Terrain camouflage suit capable of deploying and retracting instantaneously.
    • Pre-equipped from the start, players can change to any pattern on the spot.
    • Useful for any situation, whether you need to escape, ambush, evade, or infiltrate discretely.

Progressively Detect and Pinpoint Threats in Your Vicinity With a Unique Search Technique

  • Naked Sense:
    • Sharpens your senses to search your surroundings for enemies and supplies.
    • Activating it over a long period of time could be risky as it will drain the player’s stamina.
    • An alert will show when a nearby player activates it. Swiftly hide to avoid detection.

Only Those Who Show Total Mastery as Both a Soldier and Field Agent Will Survive

Hone your skills in combat and infiltration. Utilize the weapons and gear procured on-site and outlast the other cadets in survival-style training missions to prove who is best suited to serve the FOX Unit.

Your Mission: Survive Until the End

  • A multiplayer player-versus-player where you team up in pairs and play with up to 12 players.
  • Fight to survive in three types of fields, including the jungle. Two types of mission rules are available, selected at random for every match.
  • Those who failed to complete the objective during each phase will be removed from the mission.

Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Watch the new gameplay footage below.

Metal Gear Production Hotline at Tokyo Game Show 2025

(Gameplay from 9:26 to 22:35.)



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/metal-gear-solid-delta-snake-eater-online-battle-mode-fox-hunt-launches-october-30

item.title: Xelan Force AE announced for PS5, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Due out in 2026 in Japan.

PiXEL has announced vertical-scrolling shoot ’em up Xelan Force AE, or Xelan Force Advanced Edition, for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC (Steam). It will launch both physically and digitally in 2026 in Japan. The physical edition will also include the 8-bit-style Xelan Force.

Here is an overview of the game, via PiXEL:

Xelan Force is the 8-bit-style vertical-scrolling shoot ’em up originally released in 2024.

“An 8-bit console game released in the 80s reborn for arcades in the 90s with a new look!”

And thus, the curtain lifts on a new chapter of Xelan Force, bringing this “what if” scenario to life.

With a 320×224 resolution, all pixel art has been newly redrawn, the number of animation patterns greatly increased, and the atmosphere of the era faithfully recreated using raster-like effects rather than smooth scaling and rotation via vectors.

Many new characters also appear.

Composer Yasuhiro Inazawa, who also worked on Xelan Force, returns for Xelan Force AE to bring out the full charm of FM sound.

Watch the announcement teaser trailer below.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/xelan-force-ae-announced-for-ps5-switch-and-pc
